posts.title: A Librarian's Guide to Learning Korean
posts.text: Interested in learning Korean? The Library is here to help, starting with a list of links and books in our catalog (plus some tips!)

posts.title: A Librarian's Guide to Learning Japanese
posts.text: Interested in learning Japanese? The Library is here to help, starting with a list of links and books in our catalog (plus some tips!).

posts.title: Summertime Reading and Eating: 8 Books for Taco Lovers
posts.text: With summer here, taco cravings are at a peak! Whether you favor seafood, fusion, chicken, or Tex-Mex, let us help satisfy your cravings with these recommended recipe books.
